content.text: Hi there! I'm learning to play the guitar and I love it so far.
Hi there! I'm a musician myself, I play the piano and sing. I also enjoy listening to kpop.
That's awesome! I've been listening to kpop a lot lately too. What's your favorite group?
I really like Twice, Blackpink, and BTS. I also love watching their music videos.
I love Twice too! They're so cute and talented. I've been wanting to go to one of their concerts.
I went to their concert last year and it was amazing! I hope they come back to the US soon.
Me too! I'm going to keep an eye out for their tour dates.
Good idea! I'm sure you'll be able to see them soon.
Have you been to any other concerts lately?
No, I haven't been to any other concerts lately. I've been too busy with work.
I know what you mean, I've been busy with school.
I know what you mean, I've been busy with school too.
Hopefully we'll both be able to make it to a concert soon.
